scripts.dev: concurrently -n api,web -c cyan,magenta "pnpm --dir platform/apps/api dev" "pnpm --dir platform/apps/web dev"
scripts.prisma:reset-seed: pnpm --dir platform/apps/api prisma migrate reset --force && pnpm --dir platform/apps/api prisma:generate && pnpm --dir platform/apps/api prisma:seed
scripts.ci: pnpm lint:web && pnpm --dir platform/apps/api test:smoke && pnpm ci:sdk && pnpm build && pnpm --dir platform/apps/web budgets && pnpm ci:e2e
